channel.title: Xubuntu on (thoughts) => TryParse(thoughts, out blog)
channel.description: Recent content in Xubuntu on (thoughts) => TryParse(thoughts, out blog)

item.title: Chrome as default browser in Xubuntu
item.description: If you need to set Chrome as the default browser in Xubuntu, run the following from your terminal: gconftool-2 --type string -s /desktop/gnome/url-handlers/http/command "google-chrome %s"
